LanguageData.Apparel_FlakVest.label: flak vest
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakVest.description: Padded vest made from bullet-resistant materials. Provides limited protection against shrapnel and gunfire at relatively low weight.
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_CompositeVest.label: composite vest A vest with armor plates inserted on the chest and back. The composite ceramics offer better protection than steel but aren't as durable.
